keyDays.title: Few Days Matter
keyDays.subtitle: A small number of days explain most appreciation
keyDays.insight: Missing these few days would invalidate years of waiting.

about.title: About PoP
about.purposeText: This is an educational tool to demonstrate that Bitcoin investing requires sacrifice, discipline, and low time preference. It is NOT a trading tool, price predictor, or profit optimizer.
about.philosophyText: Bitcoin teaches behavior, not profit. Most of the experience is drawdown, lateralization, and discomfort. A small number of days explain most appreciation, and these days are unpredictable.
